metadata.title: Use Cases
metadata.description: Use Terraform to perform common operations with other technologies, including Consul, Vault, Packer, and Kubernetes.

collection.name: Use Cases for Terraform
collection.description: Use Terraform to perform common operations with other technologies, including Consul, Vault, Packer, and Kubernetes.

tutorials.name: Deploy Federated Multi-Cloud Kubernetes Clusters
tutorials.description: Use Terraform to provision Kubernetes clusters in the Azure and AWS clouds, deploy Consul Helm charts enabling Consul federation, and deploy an example application on both clusters.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Codify Management of Vault Using Terraform
tutorials.description:
Use HashiCorp Terraform's Vault provider to codify Vault management to
increase repeatability while reducing human errors.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Vault
product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

tutorials.name: Codify Management of Vault Enterprise Using Terraform
tutorials.description:
Use HashiCorp Terraform's Vault provider to codify Vault management to
increase repeatability while reducing human errors.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Vault
product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

tutorials.name: AppRole With Terraform & Chef
tutorials.description:
This tutorial discusses the concepts necessary to help users
understand Vault's AppRole authentication pattern and how to use it to
securely introduce a Vault authentication token to a target server,
application, or container.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Vault
product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

tutorials.name: Deploy Consul and Vault on Kubernetes with Run Triggers
tutorials.description: Deploy a Consul-backed Vault cluster on Kubernetes, by linking Terraform Cloud workspaces with run triggers. Share Kubernetes cluster credentials between workspaces within an organization using data resources.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Automate your network configuration with Consul-Terraform-Sync
tutorials.description: Automate updates to network infrastructure including dynamic load balancing and firewall rules with Consul-Terraform-Sync.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Consul-Terraform-Sync Run Modes and Status Inspection
tutorials.description: Discover Consul-Terraform-Sync different run modes and inspect task execution status using REST API.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Use Terraform to Register External Services
tutorials.description: Register external services with Consul using the Terraform Consul provider.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Provision Infrastructure with Packer
tutorials.description: Create an image with Packer, containing SSH keys, a new user, and a demo webapp, and deploy it with Terraform.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Manage VMs and Snapshots on vSphere
tutorials.description: Adopt infrastructure as code best practices for on-premise or private cloud infrastructure. Create and load an Ubuntu image to vSphere using Packer. Then, provision and manage a vSphere virtual machine based on that template.

product.name: Packer
product.description: Learn how to build automated machine images of using Packer.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Deploy Infrastructure with the Terraform Cloud Kubernetes Operator v1
tutorials.description:
Use the Terraform Cloud Operator for Kubernetes to manage the lifecycle of
cloud and on-prem infrastructure through a single Kubernetes custom
resource. Provision an AWS SQS message queue as a prerequisite for an
application on Kubernetes.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Manage Kubernetes Resources via Terraform
tutorials.description: Schedule a NGINX instance and expose it using the Terraform Kubernetes Provider. Configure the provider to access the cluster manually or based on kubectl context. Schedule and scale a deployment, and schedule a service.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Deploy Applications with the Helm Provider
tutorials.description: Create a Kubernetes cluster with Terraform. Use the Helm provider to deploy the nginx webserver to your cluster.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Automate Monitoring with the Terraform Datadog Provider
tutorials.description: Create metrics and endpoint monitors for a pre-configured Kubernetes cluster with the Helm and Datadog Terraform providers.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Use Application Load Balancers for Blue-Green and Canary Deployments
tutorials.description: Configure AWS application load balancers to release an application in a rolling upgrade with near-zero downtime. Incrementally promote a new canary application version to production by building a feature toggle with Terraform.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Host a Static Website with S3 and Cloudflare
tutorials.description: Set up an S3-hosted static website with Cloudflare for DNS, SSL and CDN. Redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS, and redirect certain paths with Cloudflare page rules. Alternatively, use ACM for SSL certificate management and Cloudfront for CDN.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform
